main.name: Seila Tupone
main.description: I love coding, maths and travel
main.bio: Most people in the world try to avoid problems. Others, like me, love to solve them.I'm a quick learner and a logical thinker who enjoys problem solving.I love math, programming and travelling. They allow me to discover new worlds and to fill my mind with new possibilities.I believe in surrounding myself with positive, talented people because they encourage me to push myself harder day by day.My passion and persistence are fundamental to my happiness, driving me to redefine my limits and to promote the same in those around me

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: IT Team Leader. Full lifecycle application development, analysis of suitable solutions to business requests, software testing and quality assurance.

work.title: Ruby Developer
work.description: Focus on writing test code using MiniTest and FactoryGirl. Worked with D3 Javascript library to show data.

projects.title: Form with bootstrap-sass and simple form gem

lifeStyle.text: Good software, like wine, takes time
Follow your curiosity and make mistakes. A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new
